definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: So long as opens the mouth to sing, lengthens until the dream, hears the echo to be resonant.
sentences.chinese: 只要开口唱，直到梦想延长，听到回音多嘹亮。

sentences.english: I put up an advertisement in the newspaper for the sale of my car, but there have been no responses so far.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上登了卖车广告，但是到目前为止尚无回音。

sentences.english: Enclosed is my resume, and hoping for your immediate reply.
sentences.chinese: 简历随信附上，希望早获回音。

sentences.english: We are handling your complaints, and we will call you back in 3 to 7 working-days.
sentences.chinese: 你的投诉我们已经受理，三至七个工作日会给您回音。

sentences.english: Not having received any reply from Tom, Mary decided to write to him again.
sentences.chinese: 由于没收到汤姆的回音，玛丽决定再给他写封信。

sentences.english: Fibrosis shows the lowest echogenicity except for cyst and hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 除了囊泡与出血外，纤维化组织的回音最低。

sentences.english: I consider slow propagation of whispering gallery modes along the fibre surface.
sentences.chinese: 我考虑这可能是回音壁模式沿光纤表面的缓慢传输。

sentences.english: Every words poured out it echoes of your love.
sentences.chinese: 每次滔滔不绝的字都有你爱的回音。

sentences.english: The bird-song is the echo of the morning light back from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿的歌声是大地曙光在清晨的回音。

sentences.english: Involuntarily the echoes are gently about the ear.
sentences.chinese: 这种不由自主的回音轻轻的荡漾在耳际。

sentences.english: I got five responses to my ad.
sentences.chinese: 我的广告得到五处回音。

sentences.english: Echoecho routes around this problem by using a very nifty permission-based solution.
sentences.chinese: 双重回音通过使用一流的许可方式来解决这个问题。

sentences.english: Is there some earnest prayer unanswered yet
sentences.chinese: 有些恳切的祈祷，有否回音？

sentences.english: The Echo Wall encloses the Imperial Vault.
sentences.chinese: 回音壁是皇穹宇的围墙。

sentences.english: Yet I remain unconvinced of the severity of digital echo chambers.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我仍然怀疑数字回音室的严重性。
软木制的天花板能减少回音。

definition: variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
(of a sound) to come through/to be heard/(of news) to arrive
